attributes.action: Dedicate 10% of all Council parking spaces to cars containing children under 5
attributes.additional_details:
Local Cambridge Council have 12 spaces for cars with children under 5 per 1000 parking slots and do not intend to change 

Other local councils are the same 

It a safety issue that needs to be addressed

rejection.details:
Parking restrictions are a matter for the local Council and private operators, 
not the UK Government or Parliament. You could start a petition on the Cambridge City Council calling for this action. You can do this here: https://democracy.cambridge.gov.uk/mgepetitionlistdisplay.aspx?bcr=1.

You may also like to sign the following petition which calls for more regulation of parent and child parking spaces: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318891.
